description: React component for displaying skill and competency progress, including progress bars, categories, and alerts for skill gaps.

methods.name: getProficiencyColor
methods.description: Returns color classes based on proficiency level.

methods.name: getProgressColor
methods.description: Returns progress bar color based on current progress percentage.

methods.name: getGapIndicator
methods.description: Returns JSX element indicating progress gap with icon and diff.
